SEARCH
Package com.example.fusion1_events

Class NotificationModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.fusion1_events.NotificationModel
public class NotificationModel extends Object
File: NotificationModel.java Role:
- Represents a notification sent to a user.
- Stores information about the event, title, message, timestamp, read status, senderId, receiverId.

Issues:
- Assumes Firestore fields exist and are formatted as expected.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationModel

      public NotificationModel()

    • NotificationModel

      public NotificationModel(String id, String eventName, String notificationTitle, String notificationMessage, boolean read, com.google.firebase.Timestamp createdAt, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference eventId, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference receiverId, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference senderID, boolean notified)
      Constructs a NotificationModel with all fields provided.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the notification document
      eventName - the name of the event
      notificationTitle - the title of the notification
      notificationMessage - the message of the notification
      read - boolean to see whether the notification has been marked as read
      createdAt - the timestamp when the notification was created
      eventId - Firestore reference to the event document
      receiverId - Firestore reference to the receiving user
      senderID - Firestore reference to the sending user
      notified - boolean to check if the entrant has been notified
